name: flight_matcher
description: Match parsed tweets with BTS flight performance data using fuzzy matching with confidence scoring

parsed_tweets.description: Parsed tweets with extracted flight numbers, dates, and airports

match_confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score for flight matching (0.0-1.0)

date_tolerance_days.description: Allow matching flights within +/- N days of tweet date

matched_flights.description: Tweets matched with BTS flight data, including match confidence and performance details

unmatched_tweets.description: Tweets that could not be matched to BTS data (need more info)

match_stats.description: Statistics on matching success rates and confidence distribution
